quests.welcomeMsg:
Hello there,
I will teach you the basics.
Follow my instructions and you will be fine.
quests.completedMsg:
OK lad,
use 'w' or space to jump. and 'a', 'd' or arrows to move!

quests.objectiveMsg: Now jump on that big box.
quests.completedMsg:
Excellent,
To run hold shift.
If running you can jump higher and longer!
quests.finishedMsg:
OK,
now run to the exit sign on the east!
